H0.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Ross Bagdasarian

H1.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Walt Disney

H2.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Chuck Jones

H3.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. David Seville

A4.text: Ross S. Bagdasarian was best known for creating the cartoon band Alvin and the Chipmunks.

A5.text: Ross S. Bagdasarian was also known by his stage name David Seville.

A6.text: History area on TheChipmunks.com with some photos and stories about Ross Bagdasarian
